title: Official Independent Fantasy Sports Auditor
text:
LOS ANGELES, CA --- NEXTMVP CEO Marsha L. Powell announced today upgrades to NEXTMVP’s Fantasy Sports Assurance services.
Recognized for becoming the first, independent auditor of fantasy sports websites, NEXTMVP is bringing credibility to the online gaming industry by offering its “zero-to-none” margin of error, trust seal.
More and more of the world’s leading sports companies, leagues, agencies and online gaming websites are choosing to work with NEXTMVP. For a small intrusion, Verified by NEXTMVP, may be donned upon an official website.
Around the globe, the success of Fantasy Sports companies is governed by increasingly complex and broadening regulatory requirements and stakeholder demands. CNBC staff writer Michelle Castillo writes, “…as users discover more flaws and loopholes — which result in some players being given unfair advantages — doubts about the industry are growing.”
NEXTMVP has the resources and integrity to help companies meet these demands by providing a crystal clear, independent perspective to elevate credibility.“After receiving overwhelming interest, we realized quickly that we had far more requests coming in from agencies than we could service in a reasonable period of time,” Powell said. “Efficiencies in our parallel computing and frequency scaling do indeed, keep me up at night,” Powell adds.
NEXTMVP uniquely offers multidisciplinary insights across technologies, which in turn, minimize the risk of conducting businesses on multiple platforms. They’re prepared to help you efficiently navigate the growing regulatory landscape. With unrivaled accuracy, complete anonymity and laser focus, they deliver to Fantasy game providers completeness, correctness and credibility.
To express an opinion on whether results are free of misstatements or miscalculations, whether due to internal or external data error, NEXTMVP provides the following assurance services:
• Anonymous Account Auditing
• Algorithm Verification
• Defensive Data Comparison
• Regulatory Change Preparation
• Forensic Technology
• User Dispute Discovery
NEXTMVP adapts its audit services to fit your unique needs and delivers results in a format that’s immediately actionable.
Audits begin with a visit from an assurance professional who has the breadth of experience that comes from auditing many of the world’s leading and fastest growing sports outfits. With this Assurance Service upgrade, they’ll provide an unprecedented audit perspective of the most complex algorithms, Internet protocols, and relational database structures created for Fantasy sports.
About NEXTMVP
Founded in 2006, NEXTMVP is a first and largest group of trusted advisors who go beyond traditional advisory accounting. The firm's consultants serve a wide variety of industries with a full range of accounting, audit, technology, and business advisory services. In recent years, the firm has focused on serving Fantasy Sports & online gaming providers with its Assurance Teams. The firm is consistently ranked as the nation's leading Audit & Assurance firms to provide assurance services to Fantasy Sports Organizations. The firm has offices in California, Texas and Delaware.
To learn more visit www.nextmvp.com .
